title: Black Hole Graybody Factor and Black Hole Entropy
abstract: We have proposed the entropy formula of the black hole which is constructed by the intersecting D1-brane and D5-brane with no momentum, whose compactification radii are constrained by the surface gravities in ten-dimensions. We interpret the entropy of the black hole as the statistical entropy of the effective string living on the D5-brane. We further study the behavior of the absorption cross-section of the black hole using our entropy formula.
